disableImproveGB18030.name: Block improtve GB18030
disableImproveGB18030.description[zh_CN]: 屏蔽提高中文环境下GB18030编码的识别率的策略，默认不屏蔽
disableImproveGB18030.description: Block the strategy to improve the recognition rate of GB18030 encoding in the Chinese environment, the default is not blocked

enablePatchedIconv.name: Use iconv patch
enablePatchedIconv.description[zh_CN]: 使用上层应用适配2022标准的iconv设置补丁,2005标准下此选项无效
enablePatchedIconv.description: Use the iconv settings patch that adapts to the 2022 standard，the default is false

defaultEncoding.name: Default text encoding
defaultEncoding.description[zh_CN]: 文件识别默认编码，ASCII及未知编码将使用配置的默认编码，默认UTF-8
defaultEncoding.description: Default text encoding, ASCII and unknown encoding will use the configured default encoding，the default is UTF-8
